reason: Institutional adoption and infrastructure build-out (CME futures, Interactive Brokers accepting USDC) indicate strong long-term market maturation and demand for Bitcoin. Robust ETF inflows for Bitcoin and its real-world utility in Iran underscore fundamental strength. While some altcoins exhibit short-term weakness, this likely represents re-allocation within a broader accumulation phase for Bitcoin, suggesting a period of observation before a potential markup. The inherent volatility of the crypto market, even with positive drivers, warrants a cautious WATCH approach.
headlines: CME Group to offer cardano, chainlink, stellar futures as institutions seek regulated risk-management tools
More people are using Ethereum for the first time, data shows
Iranians stash bitcoin as protests rage and rial tanks
Interactive Brokers accepts USDC deposits; Ripple's RLUSD coming soon
XRP falls 4% on crypto market weakness even as ETF inflows stay strong
